Help:Node.title: Pose
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Pose
Important Commands: cower, meditate, pray, sleep, slouch
Even when they're remaining in one place, people are usually doing something. They're often taking a continuing action (like concentrating and meditating). These continuing activities are called poses. Currently a pose is a one-time action seen as others; eventually it will reflect in your look description as well.
Stances are similar to poses; stances are also continuing physical positions, but they tend to be related to details or objects in a room.
See Also: , ,
